title: LF people to progress through flex
body:
**We are currently looking for a Mid-laner, ADC and support to have regular meet-ups after 1PM every day to progress through flex. Ideally we're looking for those that are in either high silver to gold flex ranking. If we eventually become coordinated enough as a team, we will go competitive. Swing me an add in League or comment below if you're interested:
**

**_IGN: RazorRenegade _**
